Pushlets - Documentation

This contains all documentation for the Pushlets distribution. See www.pushlets.com for latest news/versions. Read this whitepaper to get a first idea of the why, what and how. Additionally, you may want to read my JavaWorld article on Pushlets.

Many other references can be found on the web (e.g. try a search on "pushlets" on Google). In print "Professional JSP" (Wrox Press 1th ed.) devotes text to Pushlets starting on page 610.

What's New ?

See www.pushlets.com for latest news/versions.

Discussion

There is a Pushlet discussion list at YahooGroups, so that your opinions can be shared. I will forward some of the private email responses I've gotten to that list. Click here to go to the discussion page.
